The world of music is constantly evolving, and new styles of metal can require more than even a seven-string can offer. That's why ESP LTD has introduced this new 8-string model: the LTD H-308. Based on their H-style body shape, the H-308 delivers high performance via a set-thru maple neck, mahogany body, and an EMG 808 active pickup set. FEATURESMahogany body25.5" Scale set-thru maple neckRosewood fretboard with 24 XJ fretsEMG 808 active bridge pickupEMG 808 active neck pickupMaster volume and tone controlsESP tunersBlack satin hardwareOwn this supremely versatile metal monster.
